content: Ralph is awesome! His teaching has completely transformed my playingâ€”now I can solo with feeling and confidence!
His improvisation class taught me to speak musically and connect with other players on stage.

I've tried a lot of guitar courses in the past. Just when I was about to give up in frustration, I found Ralph. He's motivated me through setbacks. And last week, I found an opportunity to perform a song he'd taught me to my grandkids. I'm extremely grateful to have found Ralph.
I've taken Ralph's absolute beginner Class. Ralph is a very jovial instructor. 100% recommend to anyone who's an absolute beginner!
